titleNullable: Solar Photovoltaics Panel for Dust Detection
subtitleNullable: Classification between clean and dirty solar photovoltaics panel
descriptionNullable:
**Context**
The image dataset consists of clean and dirty solar panels that detect the existence of dust on the solar photovoltaics panel.

**Acknowledgements**
The solar panel image dataset was compiled by:
@Article{SolNet2022,
AUTHOR = {Md Saif Hassan Onim, Zubayar Mahatab Md Sakif, Adil Ahnaf, Ahsan Kabir, Abul Kalam Azad, Amanullah Maung Than Oo, Rafina Afreen, Sumaita Tanjim Hridy, Mahtab Hossain, Taskeed Jabid, and Md SawkatAli},
TITLE = {SolNet: A Convolutional Neural Network for Detecting Dust on Solar Panels},
JOURNAL = {Energies},
VOLUME = {16},
YEAR = {2023},
NUMBER = {1},
ARTICLE-NUMBER = {155},
URL = {https://www.mdpi.com/1996-1073/16/1/155},
ISSN = {1996-1073},
DOI = {10.3390/en16010155}
}
